#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int test, total = 0, credit = 0;
	char str[101];
	cin>>test;
	for(int tell = 0 ; tell < test ; tell++){
		total = 0;
		cin>>str;
		credit = 0;
		for(int i = 0 ; i < strlen(str) ; i++){
			if(credit == 6){
				credit = 0;
			}else{
				if(str[i] == 'L' || str[i] == 'l'){
					total += 4;
				}else if(str[i] == 'M' || str[i] == 'm') {
					total += 3;
				}
				credit++;
			}
		}
		cout<<total<<endl;
	}
}
